translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir

While the police commander of this district was engaged in the effort to apprehend certain deserters from the 8th Corps of National Guards, he captured one of the 1st Line, whom I hereby send to Your Excellency today, Francisco Fabiano da Silva, and I do not mention the battalion to which he belongs because he does not know it, or does not wish to declare it. This is all I have to report and I have the honor to bring it to the respectful knowledge of Your Excellency.

God keep Your Excellency

Military Command Headquarters of the municipality of Santo Ant么nio, Santo Ant么nio, December 7, 1842.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir  
Baron of Caxias  
Distinguished President and General-in-Chief of the Army

Ant么nio de Melo e Albuquerque  
Colonel Military Commander of the municipality of Santo Ant么nio
